results.label: JustGive
results.description: JustGive is a nonprofit organization whose mission is to increase charitable giving by connecting people with the charities and causes they care most about. The site offers many ways to give—direct donations, charity gift cards, charity gift registries, wedding registries, gift collections, and memorial donations—for every purpose and occasion. A partnership with GuideStar gives donors access to more than 1.8 million 501(c)(3) organizations.

categories.label: Non-profit organizations based in San Francisco, California
